S

saveFolder - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.LoadSave
Defines the name of the parent folder where the level file is saved.
saveLevel() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Editing
Saves all changes made in the level editor to the level file and updates the current instance of the level across the editing and playing fields.
saveLevel(String, int[][], Flag, Flag) - Static method in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.LoadSave
Converts the changes made in the built-in level editor into a written level format.
SceneMethods - Interface in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes
Defines a default set of methods that are required to be implemented by all subclasses inheriting game scenes.
SELEN - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Units
Shoots at an enemy, dealing damage and applying burning.
SELEN_PROJ - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Projectiles
Fired by Selen, applying a burn to the enemy when hit.
setActive(boolean) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Projectile
Sets the state of the projectile to whether it has not collided with an enemy.
setChilled(boolean) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Applies a Chilling (Petra) effect to this enemy while active, reducing its movement speed by 25%.
setDisplayedUnit(Unit) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.ActionBar
Sets the displayed unit to the passed unit.
setGamePaused(boolean) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Pauses or unpauses the game.
setGameState(GameStates) - Static method in enum class com.vtuberrush.src.main.GameStates
Sets the current GameStates.gameState of the program, called when pressing buttons or when game end conditions are met.
setLevel(int[][]) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Sets the playing field equal to the passed two-dimensional level format which was converted using MathFunctions from reading a level file in LoadSave.
setMouseOver(boolean) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Button
Updates the hovered state of this button.

setPosition(int, int) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Modifies the position of this unit to the passed (x, y) coordinates.
setPosition(Point2D.Float) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Projectile
Sets the position of the projectile.
setSelectedTile(Tile) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Editing
Modifies the currently selected tile to the first tile in a category mapped to the new button pressed, or the next tile in the category of the last selected tile if a new variant was requested.
setSelectedUnit(Unit) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Modifies the currently selected unit to be the unit either clicked from the playing field or clicked from the associated unit button in the action bar.
setText(String) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Button
Updates the text of this button.
Settings - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.scenes
An settings game scene is a subclass of a game scene is a future use scene for adjusting the settings, currently being used by the author as acknowledgement to all the players currently playing the game.
Settings(Game) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Settings
Creates a new settings game scene, and initializes the button for going back to the main menu.
SETTINGS - Enum constant in enum class com.vtuberrush.src.main.GameStates
Builds temporary text related to the author of the program.
Set when the player presses SETTINGS from the main menu screen.
setX(int) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Flag
Modifies the horizontal position of this flag from the left of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
setY(int) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Flag
Modifies the vertical position of this flag from the top of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
shootEnemy(Unit, Enemy) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Creates a projectile in the location of the passed unit, which travels to the passed enemy based on the unit's existing projectile speed.
SLIME_BLUE - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies
A Blue Slime (Level 2 Slime) has 250 health, 27 speed, and rewards 6 gold.
SLIME_GREEN - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies

SLIME_PURPLE - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies
A Purple Slime (Level 4 Slime) has 1562 health, 15.12 speed, and rewards 11 gold.
SLIME_RED - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies
A Red Slime (Level 3 Slime) has 625 health, 20.28 speed, and rewards 8 gold.
SLIME_WHITE - Static variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies
A White Slime (Level 5 Slime) has 3906 health, 11.14 speed, and rewards 16 gold.
